system.effect:
When an Oricorio hatches, it takes the form of its mother, or father if the other parent was a Ditto. Oricorio may change forms by consuming Nectar as an Extended Action. This determines Oricorio's primary type. The standard Nectars are as follows:
 Red Nectar: Baile (Fire)
 Yellow Nectar: Pom Pom (Electric)
 Pink Nectar: Paâ€™u (Psychic)
 Purple Nectar: Sensu (Ghost)
